svg.title: KSBCSP Member Spotlight Template
svg.desc: Reusable social media template for member and officer spotlights. All layers named. Replace text and headshot photo to create a new card.

polygon.inkscape:label: Headshot clip polygon — edit to change frame shape

rect.inkscape:label: BG base fill — change this color to retheme

g.inkscape:label: UI panel accent — top left corner

text.inkscape:label: ★ EDIT: Card type (right) — e.g. Member Spotlight / Officer Highlight
★ EDIT: Badge label — Member Feature / Officer Highlight / Alumni Spotlight

g.inkscape:label: ★ PHOTO AREA — import and paste headshot image inside this group

rect.inkscape:label: Placeholder background — delete when adding photo

g.inkscape:label: Delete this group when adding real photo

text.inkscape:label: Placeholder text — delete when adding photo
★ EDIT: Role — e.g. Club Member / President / Design Lead / Secretary
★ EDIT: Last name (accent color: #00D9FF for member, #FFB800 for officer)

line.inkscape:label: Separator line between major and year
Rule 1 — swap gradient for officer variant
Quote left border — change color to #00D9FF for officer variant

text.inkscape:label: ★ EDIT: Member quote (2-3 sentences, ~120 chars)
text.tspan: Design is the bridge between how tech works
and how humans feel about it. That's the space

g.inkscape:label: Center logo pill — change fill to #FFB800 for officer
07 · Officer Variant Overrides (HIDE for member mode)
99 · Design Notes — HIDE BEFORE EXPORT
g.text: KSBCSP MEMBER SPOTLIGHT TEMPLATE · 1080×1080 · INKSCAPE SVG · HIDE LAYER 99 BEFORE EXPORT
